name: The Zombiest Adventures In The Perverted Age of Enlightenment With a Pinch of Woodpunk
summary: What would happen if a zombie apocalypse had occurred in 1650? Controlling a small group of survivors, you will have to do road robbery, hunt for gunpowder and constantly search for food. Welcome to The Zombiest Adventures In The Perverted Age of Enlightenment With a Pinch of Woodpunk!
